title: How to install beta client without (re) installing everything ( legacy client )
body:
Hello,
I would appreciat to know if there is a way to install the beta client (since the legacy client is gone ) without having to install the legacy client then upgrading it to the beta. I suppressed league of legend for my exam session so i could focus, then i want to reinstall the game and i have to reinstall everything (legacy than upgrade it to Beta)and i want to know if i can download the beta directly from the internet or from somewhere else than the old client  to save A LOT OF TIME since i have a slow connection

PLZ help me and thanksfor your feedback

replies.body: I cant reinstall  when its 40-50 it just popps up unspecified error occurred please check logs for more information i dont know what to do i have downloaded hextech repair tool but its still now working can someone help me.  Sorry for bad english

The installer hasn't been set to the updated version just yet.  The transition over from the legacy version is nearly complete, though, and will likely update once we're ready to remove all the old client assets.  Your best bet for now would be to reinstall through the normal [download source](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload).  I know that may take a while, hang in there!
